Other Information.Additional Info: High-density electronegativity O and N atoms promote interactions with n-C4H10.
Negligible uptake due to larger size compared to pore aperture.

Sieving Mechanism: Synergistic effect of pore confinement and uncoordinated carboxyl groups

Experimental Validation.Method: Breakthrough experiment, Gas-loaded single crystal X-ray analysis, Modeling calculation
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: n-C4H10/iso-C4H10 selectivity: 246.75, n-C4H10 productivity: 42.83 L/kg, iso-C4H10 productivity: 42.35 L/kg

Other Information.Additional Info: Activated FJI-H38 exhibits high butane capacity at low pressure and excellent separation performance under various conditions.
